about_the_game:
Enter a future of democratized space travel and exploration with one catch – a powerful corporate consortium pulls the strings. This story begins when an expert combat pilot wakes up unbeknownst of her whereabouts, history and name. She will have to fight to determine who she is, what it means to her, and what the future holds.

FEATURES

Dynamic Combat System

  • Master a diverse arsenal from rapid-fire gatling weapons to devastating condensed matter cannons
  • Strategically employ the right weapon for each encounter - shred light fighters with flak, disable larger ships with concentrated fire
  • Harness experimental Quantum Field Manipulators to warp space, create temporary singularities, and turn the tide of battle
  • Control the battlefield by launching debris and redirecting projectiles with mass manipulation technology

Harness Quantum Technology

Wield powerful Quantum Field Manipulators (QFMs) that bend reality to your will:

  • Blink through space to outmaneuver enemies
  • Create temporary singularities to trap or destroy threats
  • Project holographic decoys to confuse your opponents
  • Deflect incoming fire with quantum shields

Strategic Stealth Gameplay

  • Hide in asteroid fields and debris to avoid detection
  • Monitor enemy patrol patterns and fields of vision
  • Strike from the shadows for devastating sneak attacks
  • Choose between stealth or combat approaches in many missions

Immersive Narrative

  • Uncover the truth about your past in a story of identity and redemption
  • Make choices that influence your relationships with key characters and factions
  • Experience multiple possible endings based on your decisions
  • Explore a rich universe of corporate warfare and revolutionary conflict

Varied Mission Types

  • Infiltrate heavily guarded corporate facilities
  • Engage in intense space dogfights
  • Face off against challenging boss encounters
  • Navigate treacherous asteroid fields while managing resources

Deep Resource Management

  • Mine valuable minerals from asteroids
  • Trade at various space stations and black markets
  • Manage your ship's energy systems and cargo
  • Upgrade your equipment with salvaged materials

From tense stealth missions to epic space battles, Carbon Reset combines action-packed gameplay with a compelling narrative of self-discovery. Will you embrace your forgotten past, forge a new identity, or reshape the future of human space travel? The choice is yours.


Includes substantial mission replay value with multiple approaches to combat and stealth scenarios. Features a linear main story with RPG elements and meaningful character interactions that affect the narrative.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or Later / SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL-compatible graphics / Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard sound card compatible with Linux
  • VR Support: N/A

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10 or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Apple M1 (for Apple Silicon compatibility, optimized for Rosetta or native M1)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (Intel HD Graphics or Apple Silicon GPU)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard sound card compatible with macOS
  • Additional Notes: Supports both Intel and Apple Silicon
